attributes.action: Free prescription for hypertensive patients to prevent CVD
attributes.additional_details:
HYPERTENSION IS THE LEADING CAUSE OF MANY HEART DISEASES AND LOTS OF HYPERTENSIVE PATIENTS ARE ON MORE THAN ONE MEDICATION. THE NHS CHARGES £7.65p ON EACH DRUG WHICH MANY SUFFERERS ARE RELUCTANT TO PAY WHEN IT COMES TO MULTIPLE PRESCRIPTIONS AND JUST ON 2 MONTHLY BASIS AS GP's PRESCRIBES.

DUE TO THIS MANY HYPERTENSIVE PATIENTS ARE NOT COMPLYING WITH MEDICATIONS OR ARE IN DENIAL, WHICH IN MOST CASES LEADS TO COMPLICATIONS THAT MAKES THE NHS SUFFERS MORE on COST OF ADMISSIONS FOR TREATMENT ON STROKE, HEART ATTACK TO NAME BUT FEW AND ALSO HAVING DEVASTATING EFFECT ON THE PATIENTS INVOLVED, EVEN DEATH.

IF ALL HYPERTENSIVE PATIENTS ARE GIVEN FREE MEDICATIONS or CHARGES OF 1 POUND PER ITEM, THIS WILL REDUCE THE NHS WAITING TIMES/LISTS, THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WITH STOKES, HEART FAILURE, HEART ATTACK and OVER ALL SAVES MONEY AND LIVES. THERE IS NO POINT IN WASTING MONEY ON AMBULATORY BLOOD PRESSURE MACHINE AS SUGGESTED IN THE NEWS RECENTLY. PLEASE SIGN TO SUPPORT THIS PETITION. THANKS
